p: The five randomly selected PB larvae were assessed for genetic species identification. A total of 16 cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 (COI) sequences including those from PB and its closely related species were used for comparative analysis based on multiple sequence alignment ( Figure 1). The five samples used in this study were confirmed as authentic P. brevitarsis, with different COI sequences when compared to the closely related species. Intraspecies sequence variation in five P. brevitarsis samples was shown at four nucleotide positions, which were 158 (G/A), 164 (C/T), 389 (C/T), and 458 (A/G). Thus, intraspecies sequence variability was about 0.34% in P. brevitarsis.
